channel.title: Docker on instantiator.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on instantiator.dev

item.title: Your own map server
item.description: A quick guide to running your own tile server, with a geo database populated from OpenStreetMap data.

item.title: 3D puzzle print: a crossword generation tool
item.description: A tool to design 3D printed crossword puzzles. Generating 3D crossword models I’ve been working on a tool to generate crossword designs using OpenSCAD.

item.title: 8-bit Supercomputer
item.description: It took me 3 weeks to complete the day 11 puzzle for Advent of Code on a BBC Micro this year, and you’d be hard pressed to describe my solution as “proportionate” or “necessary”…

item.title: International Consensus Chess is in public beta!
item.description: Consensus Chess is going through some beta testing on Mastodon, and you can play today!

item.title: International Consensus Games (WIP)
item.description: I’ve been working on a pet project recently: Consensus games are a fun new way to play together through social media…
